game.description: Original game by Zed A. Shaw

room.title: Central Corridor
room.description:
The Gothons of Planet Percal #25 have invaded your ship and destroyed your entire crew. You are the last surviving member and your last mission is to get neutron destruct bomb from the weapon armory, put it in the bridge, and blow the ship up after getting into the escape pod.
Your are running down the central corridor to the Weapons Armory when a Gothon jumps out, red scaly skin, dark grimy teeth, and evil clown costume flowing around his hate filled body. He's blocking the door to the the Armory and about to pull a weapon to blast you.
room.hint: You can shoot, dodge or fight but a joke is always loosens up the atmosphere!

room.title: Laser Weapon Armory
room.description:
Lucky for you they made you learn Gothon insults in the academy. You tell the one Gothon joke you know: 'Lbhe zbgure vf fb sng, jura fur fvgf nebhaq gur ubhfr, fur fvgf nebhaq gur ubhfr.' The Gothon stops, tries not to laugh, then bursts out laughing and can't move. While he's laughing you run up and shoot him square in the head putting him down, then jump through the Weapon Armory door.
You do a dive roll into the Weapon Armory, crouch and scan the room for more Gothons that might be hiding. It's dead quiet, too quiet. You stand up and run to the far side of the room and find the neutron bomb in its container. There's a keypad lock on the box and you need the code to get the bomb out. If you get the code wrong 10 times then the lock closes forever and you can't get the bomb. The code is 3 digits.
room.hint: Your guess is as good as mine! Literally in this case!

room.title: The Bridge
room.description:
The container clicks open and the seal breaks, letting gas out. You grab the neutron bomb and run as fast as you can to the bridge where you must place it in the right spot.
You burst on to the Bridge with the neutron distruct bomb under your arm and surprise five Gothons who are trying to take control of the ship. Each of them have an even uglier costume than the last. They haven't pulled their weapons out yet, as they see the active bomb under your arm and don't want to set it off.
room.hint: Maybe you should let them have the bomb but no rush!

room.title: Escape pod
room.description:
You point your blaster at the bomb under your arm and the Gothons put their hands up and start to sweat. You inch backward to the door, open it, and then carefully place the bomb on the floor, pointing your blaster at it. You then jump back through the door, punch the close button and blast the lock so the Gothon can't get out. Now that the bomb is placed you run to the escape pod to get off this tin can.
You rush through the ship desperately trying to make it to the escape pod before the whole ship explodes. It seems like hardly any Gothons are on the ship, so your run is clear with interference. You get to the chamber with the escape pods, and now you need to pick one to take. Some of them could be damaged but you don/'t have time to look. There is five pods, which one do you take?
room.hint: 20% is not a bad chance at all! Take lottery as an example! Not bad, innit?

room.title: The End. You Won!
room.description: You jump into your choosen pod and hit the eject button. The pod easily slides out into space heading to the planet below. As it flies to the planet, you look back see your ship implode then explode like a bright star, taking out the Gothon ship at the same time. You won!

room.title: The End. You Lost!
room.description: You jump into a random pod and hit the eject button. The pod escapes out into the void of space, then implodes as the hull ruptures, crushing your body into jam jelly.
